author: Simon Difford
description: For the complete "on the Med" experience, you may want to use a Mediterranean-style gin, but we prefer a London dry style so perhaps making this a Brit On The Med.
name: On the Med
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
